title: Dumplings with chocolate centres and cherry sauce

ingredients.content: 20 g butter, plus extra for greasing
600 g cherries, pitted, fresh or defrosted

preparations.content: Place milk, sugar, butter and yeast in mixing bowl and warm <b>3 min/37°C/speed 2<b>.
Add flour, salt and egg and knead <b>3 min/<b>. Meanwhile, grease Varoma dish and tray with butter.

Divide dough into 16 equal pieces, press each flat and place a chocolate piece in the centre of each. Form dumplings by pinching dough to close it around chocolate pieces. Place 7 dumplings in prepared Varoma dish and 9 in Varoma tray. Allow to rise in covered Varoma in a warm place for 30 minutes.
Place water in mixing bowl, set Varoma in position and steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside and keep it covered. Empty mixing bowl.
Place cherries, cornflour and sugar in mixing bowl and blend <b>15 sec/speed 8<b>.
Remove measuring cup, set Varoma in position and cook sauce <b>8 min/100°C/speed 2<b>. Serve dumplings and cherry sauce immediately.
